ru.ncedu.iva34609707.urldwnld

Interface URLDownloader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    URLDownloaderImpl

    public interface URLDownloader
    The interface establishes main aspects of task about saving the resource of given URL.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String saveFileTo(java.lang.String pathStr, java.lang.String nameFile)
      The method tries to save file on this path.
      java.lang.String saveFromURL(java.lang.String urlStr)
      The method saves the contents of resource which URL is given.
      void showFile(java.io.File file)
      The method opens the file

    • Method Detail

      • saveFromURL

        java.lang.String saveFromURL(java.lang.String urlStr)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The method saves the contents of resource which URL is given. Saved file may be opened.
        Parameters:
        urlStr - String representation of URL of some resource
        Returns:
        path to this saved file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if url isn't valid

      • saveFileTo

        java.lang.String saveFileTo(java.lang.String pathStr,
                            java.lang.String nameFile)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The method tries to save file on this path. If path hasn't existed yet, it will be created. If path exists and there is a file with such name, it will ask to replace by new file or not. If choice is not to replace, then it offers to establish new name and this name will be checked.
        Parameters:
        pathStr - String representation of the path to the file
        nameFile - Name of saving file
        Returns:
        approved full path to this file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the arguments is null

      • showFile

        void showFile(java.io.File file)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
              java.lang.IllegalStateException
        The method opens the file
        Parameters:
        file - the file which is needed to open
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if something goes wrong
